title: DecisionEvent Base Schema
description: Base schema for all agent DecisionEvents persisted to ruvector-service

agent_id.description: Unique identifier for the agent type

decision_type.description: Type of decision made by the agent

inputs_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the input payload

confidence.description: Confidence score for the decision (retrieval relevance or association strength)

constraints_applied.description: List of constraints applied during processing

execution_ref.description: Unique reference for this execution instance

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp when the decision was made
